title: Drawing, "Sketch.  The cone of the "Cotopaxi from near / Ambato", Ecuador", 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on buff paper
markings:
Recto: Stamped in black ink, at lower left: Museum for Art of Decoration - Cooper Union
Verso: Stamped in black ink at center: Museum for Art of Decoration - Cooper Union
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: Cotopaxi from near / Ambato; again (1853) erased; and also erased at lower left:  Presented 1917 / By L. P. Church N [?] 126.
description: Horizontal view across ridges and summits with the cone of Cotopaxi dominating.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch.  The cone of the "Cotopaxi from near / Ambato", Ecuador", 1853.
1853. Graphite, brush and white gouache on buff paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-120.
